title: RHOC Recap (Choo-Choo Confession) + RHOP Recap (Grand Cayman Calamity)

itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Orange County and Real Housewives of Potomac. On Orange County, Gina reveals more about her relationship with Matt, Shannon bonds with Braunwyn, and Vicki reveals something shocking that may or may not h...
description:
Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Orange County and Real Housewives of Potomac. On Orange County, Gina reveals more about her relationship with Matt, Shannon bonds with Braunwyn, and Vicki reveals something shocking that may or may not have to do with a train. On Potomac, the women continue their legendary season with a beautiful tropical getaway and a showdown between Ashley and Katie.


RHOP: 38:08ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
